name: Dungeon Arcade
description:
Dungeon Arcade is a collection of three arcade-style games:

The Floor is Lava - Use the floating platforms to try to stay off the ground as long as possible.

Escape the Dungeon - Jump and dive in this endless runner game as you try for a best time and collect coins

The Sky is Falling - Dodge falling blocks as you try to stay alive as long as possible

Track your progress with the 36 in-game achievements!
